content:
Danger Will Robinson!  It looks to me like the marketing types might be dumbing down the game to appeal to a broader audience.  Remember that horrible "highlighted puck" that would shoot red streaks when someone slapped it hard enough?  Ugh.
The NHLPA has done major damage to this sport - I only hope it can recover.
Hey Harry!  You still there?  Your wife is blogging, what about you?  You on vacation for the last month or something, man?
